books.title: Payment Deferred
books.author: C. S. Forester
books.summary: A family man desperate for money murders a rich relative, and has to deal with the consequences.

books.title: The Man in the Brown Suit
books.author: Agatha Christie
books.summary: Anne Beddingfeld travels to South Africa after finding a cryptic note beside the body of a man whose death she witnessed in the London Underground.

books.title: My Reminiscences
books.author: Rabindranath Tagore
books.summary: Autobiographical sketches from the Bengali writer, poet, and artist Rabindranath Tagore.

books.title: Tombstone
books.author: Walter Noble Burns
books.summary: An embellished retelling of the town of Tombstone, Arizona, during its heyday in the late 19th century, featuring famous heroes and outlaws of the American Old West.

books.title: Children’s Stories
books.author: Oscar Wilde
books.summary: A collection of Oscar Wilde’s children’s stories.

books.title: Indiscretions of Archie
books.author: P. G. Wodehouse
books.summary: When Englishman Archie Moffam makes a complaint about his room to the owner of the New York hotel, his life is changed forever.

books.title: Agamemnon
books.author: Aeschylus
books.summary: The titular Greek king returns home from the Trojan war to be greeted by his scheming wife, who plots vengeance.

books.title: A Princess of Mars
books.author: Edgar Rice Burroughs
books.summary: An adventurer finds himself battling alien civilizations on the strange surface of Mars.

books.title: Albert Savarus
books.author: Honoré de Balzac
books.summary: A mysterious lawyer shows up in a town, opens a practice, and starts a newspaper.

books.title: Short Fiction
books.author: Arthur Machen
books.summary: A collection of nine short fiction works by influential supernatural and horror author Arthur Machen.

books.title: Red Dusk and the Morrow
books.author: Paul Dukes
books.summary: A newly-minted secret agent is sent to pick up the pieces of Britain’s spy networks after they are shattered by the Red Terror.

books.title: The Slaves of Paris
books.author: Émile Gaboriau
books.summary: A group of blackmailers play a long game on several families.

books.title: The Art of War
books.author: Sun Tzu
books.summary: An ancient Chinese classic discussing the art of war.

books.title: What Is Property?
books.author: Pierre-Joseph Proudhon
books.summary: Proudhon outlines the anarchist economic theory of mutualism.

books.title: Leaves of Grass
books.author: Walt Whitman
books.summary: The definitive collection of Walt Whitman’s poetry.

books.title: Lady Windermere’s Fan
books.author: Oscar Wilde
books.summary: A witty comedy that subverts the harsh social codes of Victorian England.

books.title: Short Fiction
books.author: Philip K. Dick
books.summary: A collection of short works by science fiction legend Philip K. Dick.

books.title: Short Fiction
books.author: H. P. Lovecraft
books.summary: The complete U.S. public domain short fiction of horror legend H. P. Lovecraft.

books.title: Practical Mysticism
books.author: Evelyn Underhill
books.summary: Evelyn Underhill makes the case that mysticism is accessible and beneficial to everyone.

books.title: Through the Brazilian Wilderness
books.author: Theodore Roosevelt
books.summary: Theodore Roosevelt’s autobiographical account of his expedition into the uncharted depths of the Brazilian rainforest.
